divs: Sighting Detailsfor more than two months i have wittnenesed what looked like a star but at a lower level than the normal seen stars on the horizon a bright star above the white sands missle range an below or levevel with the opposeing mountain range behind it to the sw. it has flashing changeing color pattern like christmjas tree lights red green white yellow but only lasts for a certain time then turns out. i will start documenting the time of appearance an time of doisappearance.
